verses.text: Ex quelemtac ab'ec, yujto tzex avtaji yic tzeyik' e jelanil, yic sq'uib' pax e pensar.
Yalnhej b'aj ayex eq'ui, d'a junoc tzalan, ma d'a yol b'e, ma b'aj schalaj sb'a b'e, tzex avtaji.
Anhejtona' d'a spuertail e chonhab', tzex avtajpaxi.
E masanil ex anima ayex d'a yolyib'anhq'uinal tic, ab'ec.
Ex quelemtac to mantalaj e pensar, k'ayb'ejec e b'a d'a jelanil. Ex chuc e pensar, sayec jelan pensaril.
Ab'ec val sik'lab'il, ol alchaj juntzanh tastac nivac yelk'och d'ayex, manhxo jantacoc svach'il.
Te yel tas ol alchaj d'ayex, malaj tas tonhej ol nachajq'ueoc.
Masanil juntzanh lolonel tic vach'nhej, malaj jab'oc es d'ay.
A eb' jelan, secojtac tz'aj snachajel juntzanh lolonel tic yuj eb'. A eb' ay spensar yojtac eb' tas syalelk'ochi.
Aq'uec eyip eyik'an e jelanil yed' aj pensaril, yujto yelxo val te nivan yelk'och d'a yichanh q'uen oro yed' q'uen plata.
Yelxo val te vach' jelanil d'a yichanh q'uen q'ueen te vach' yilji yed' d'a yichanh junoc tas snib'aj val ochi.
A jelanil, yetb'eyum sb'a yed' vach' pensaril. Syak' cojtaquejel juntzanh vach' razonal.
Tato ay yelk'och Jehov치 d'ayonh, sco chaccanel chucal. Tato jelan onh, max yal-laj quik'anchaanh co b'a. Max co nib'ejochlaj chuc b'eyb'al yed' es.
Tato ay co jelanil, syal co naan junoc tas sco k'ulej d'a stojolal, tz'elnhejpaxk'ochi.
A yuj jelanil syak' yajalil eb' rey, tojol syutej eb' sch'olb'itan tastac yaj eb' yetanimail.
Yuj jelanil chi', a eb' ayoch yajalil, vach' syutej eb' stanhvan schonhab', vach' pax syutej eb' sb'oan yaj yoval eb' anima.
A mach sayanek' jelanil yed' smasanil sk'ool, tz'ilchaj yuuj.
Yuj jelanil chi', tz'aj co b'eyumal, tzonh b'inaj yuuj, ay pax quelk'ochi.
A tas tz'ilchaj yuj jelanil chi', yelxo te vach' d'a yichanh q'uen oro yed' q'uen plata sik'b'ileli.
Yuj jelanil, sco b'eyb'alej vach'ilal yed' tojolal.
A mach snib'an jelanil, ol yik' sb'eyumal yuuj. Ol b'ud'joc spat yuj masanil tastac vach'.
A jelanil chi', aytaxoneq'ui ayic ix el yich smunlajel Jehov치, ayic manto sb'o masanil tastac,
ayic manto sb'o yolyib'anhq'uinal tic,
ayic mantalaj a' nivac mar, mantalaj pax sjaj a' nivac a' sq'ueuli yed' pax sjaj a' cotac a'.
Ayic manto sb'olaj lum tzalquixtac yed' lum nivac vitz, ayxoek' jelanil chi' ta'.
Ix yik'canel yich jelanil Jehov치 ayic manto sb'olaj lum luum tic, mantalaj spococal jun yolyib'anhq'uinal tic ta'.
Ayic ix sb'oanq'ue satchaanh masanto b'aj schalaj sb'a yed' a' mar, aytaxon ek' jelanil chi' ta'.
Ayic ix sb'oan asun ay d'a satchaanh yed' pax yic ix syamanoch vaan a' mar,
ayic ix yalan d'a a' mar chi' to manh ol el a' b'aj aycani yed' pax ix yak'anem yich lum luum tic, aytaxon ek' jelanil chi' ta'.
A yuj sjelanil Dios ix sb'oq'ue masanil tastac, ste tzalaj yuj tastac ix sb'o chi', yujto a' sch'oxanel sjelanil.
Stzalaj yuj yolyib'anhq'uinal yed' eb' anima sb'onac.
Axo ticnaic ex anima, ab'ec val tas tz'alchaj d'ayex, b'eyb'alejec jelanil yic te vach' eyico'.
Chaec eyab' e k'ayb'ub'al, manh e patiquejel jelanil.
Te vach' yic mach scham val yab'an lolonel yic jelanil,
yujto a mach tz'ilchaj jelanil chi' yuuj, tz'ilchajpax sq'uinal, syik'anpax svach'k'olal Jehov치.
Palta a mach max chaan yab' lolonel yic jelanil, munil syik'cot yaelal d'a yib'anh.
